casebody.data:
The Mayor, &c., Respondents, v. Collis P. Huntington, Appellant. Decided July 6, 1886. Appeal from judgment. Charles N. Tweed, attorney, and Francis Lynde Stetson, of counsel for appellant. E. H. Lacombe, counsel to the corporation, and D. J. Dean, for respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Truax and O’Gorman, JJ.

Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed with costs, on the opinion of the trial judge.
